mapper.sql: id, name, phone_number, phone_type, ordering, ins_id, ins_ymdhms, upd_id, upd_ymdhms, upd_eac, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from m_common_phone where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.delete: delete from m_common_phone where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into m_common_phone (id, name, phone_number, phone_type, ordering, ins_id, ins_ymdhms, upd_id, upd_ymdhms, upd_eac, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ordering,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update m_common_phone
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_type = #{phoneType,jdbcType=CHAR},
ordering = #{ordering,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ins_id = #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ins_ymdhms = #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_id = #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
upd_ymdhms = #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_eac = #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)

update m_common_phone set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_type = #{phoneType,jdbcType=CHAR}, ordering = #{ordering,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ins_id = #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ins_ymdhms = #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_id = #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upd_ymdhms = #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_eac = #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM m_common_phone
and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
and phone_number like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber}),'%')
and phone_type = #{phoneType,jdbcType=CHAR}
AND del_flag='0' order by ordering
LIMIT #{startPage}, #{endPage}
select name as name, phone_number as phoneNumber from m_common_phone where del_flag='0' order by ordering
